text: Donald Tusk (right) tells the closing press conference at #EUCO that the EU is "prepared for the worst but hoping for the best" on #Brexit. Stressing that #Article50 revocation remains on the table, he added: "As you know, hope dies last"
author: AndyWoodcock

text: Bump for those who weren't in the market for #Brexit explainers at 3am but quite fancy reading one over breakfast
author: AndyWoodcock

text: So you've heard that the #Brexit timetable has been ripped up. But what happens next? Here's my guide through the next few days and weeks (and months?)
author: AndyWoodcock

text: #Brexit: What happens next? Here's my attempt to disentangle the complexities of the next few days and weeks (Warning: will probably have to be revised tomorrow, if not sooner...)
author: AndyWoodcock

text: Exactly 1,000 days after the EU referendum,@theresa_may to ask Brussels for delay to #Brexit
author: AndyWoodcock

text: Different Andrew Woodcock, I think. Happy to come along if there's nibbles, though...
author: AndyWoodcock
